::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer grins at her answer. "Neither," he replies proudly, "I'm with the 
Alliance! We're the most superior faction here, and mercenaries are always 
welcome. I'm DevilDuer, what's your name?"

He was still ready for battle, his hand still near his gun.
